text:
Tourism New Zealand connects with luxury tourism fair loop in Germany to boost authentic luxury experiences   
Oct 13, 2015 eTN   
Ever since the trilogy Lord of the Rings New Zealand has become a hot spot for nature lovers, adventurers and backpackers. Nevertheless, the stunning country has much more to offer. It is a treasure trove for gourmets and demanding connoisseurs. New Zealand manages to create exclusive experiences that appeal to all senses and satisfy every desire for luxury and comfort. The Tourist Board Tourism New Zealand will present the various options at Germany's only B2B Luxury Travel Fair loop in April 2016. More information about loop at www.loop-luxury-fair.com . 
Tourism New Zealand is the organisation responsible for marketing New Zealand to the world as a tourist destination. 
New Zealand offers bespoke and authentic luxury experiences in stunning natural settings hosted by our naturally warm and welcoming people. 
Luxury experiences cater to all tastes, set amongst a backdrop of breath-taking landscapes - from heli-picnics atop soaring mountains to personal chefs being helicoptered directly to your charter boat, or private tastings at New Zealand’s best wineries. After a day of languid pampering or exhilarating activities, travellers can wind down at one of New Zealand’s finest lodges, discovering for themselves how nature meets luxury and how the warm and genuine hosts create a relaxed luxury experience. Return home relaxed and fulfilled, knowing that they have just had a one-of-a-kind experience. Further information at www.newzealand.com/luxury . 
About loop – Luxury on our Planet: 
From 10th to 13th of April 2016 Frankfurt will transform into a mecca for the international luxury tourism industry. Germany's only luxury exhibition "loop - Luxury on our Planet" opens its doors for 100 international renowned hoteliers, hotel owners and providers of tourist luxury products to meet with 100 interested buyers from the German-speaking market. The exhibition has established itself over the past two years as the most important B2B event in the German luxury tourism market, with the goal to increase revenues targeted to both suppliers and retailers. Registrations can be made immediately at www.loop-luxury-fair.com
